Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- ATK & DEF 150%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Changes Ki Spheres: INT to STR
*For every STR Ki Sphere obtained*
- ATK & DEF 50%{passiveImg:up_g}
*5 or more Ki Spheres obtained*
- Launches an additional Super Attack
*When there is another "Majin Buu Saga" Category ally
attacking in the same turn*
- Damage reduction rate 30%{passiveImg:up_g} with 3 or more STR
Ki Spheres obtained
- Damage reduction rate 3%{passiveImg:up_g} per STR Ki Sphere obtained
(count starts from the 4th Ki Sphere)

5497.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK and raises DEF for 1 turn 
and causes supreme damage to all enemies 
with a medium chance of stunning them
